title: Morning Calm Korean Restaurant
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant located inside The Garden of Morning Calm which houses about 5,000 kinds of plants. Serves Korean dishes and rice, with vegan options. Directions: Take MRT from Seoul to Cheongpyeong Station. From the station, get directions to Cheongpyeong Intercity Bus Terminal which is a 15 minute walk. Once there, take a bus to the garden. Buy a ticket to enter garden; restaurant is next to Bonsai Garden. They serve Korean dishes and rice. Owner is vegetarian.
